what: Download and Filter Outage Data — get_eaglei

text: Downloadeds publically available EAGLE-data published Brelsford et al.

title: Download and Filter Outage Data — get_eaglei
Download and Filter Outage Data — get_eaglei
text: interval Dates get outage data path Path download files (provided, files download tempdir())

title: Download and Filter Outage Data — get_eaglei
text: Maximum precentage average duration outage county

title: Download and Filter Outage Data — get_eaglei
text: Customer estimates generated adding number households (ACS centered year storm) number establishments (Census SUSB year storm) per county, getting percentage households establishments per county state, multiplying percentage total number customers state (EIA year storm)

title: Download and Filter Outage Data — get_eaglei
code: if (FALSE) { harvey_eaglei <- get_eaglei(   interval = interval(harvey_start, harvey_end + days(5)),   path = "raw-data/eaglei" ) }

text: storm_id Storm name caps, dash, year (EX: "HARVEY-2017") path Path download files (provided, files download tempdir())
